Description of incident: "A local car wash isn't the only one around the country telling customers their credit card information may be at risk.Yankee Car Wash & Detailing says it was told on March 27 its point of sale system — operated by third party platform provider DRB Systems LLC — saw an intrusion that likely compromised credit card information of customers between Feb. 8 and March 3. It pointed to a breach that occurred at an Akron-based company that handles point-of-sale equipment and services for car washes around the country. Enlarge A local car wash isn't the only one around the country telling customers their credit… moreaetb "To date, the investigation indicated that the intruder placed malware on DRB Systems LLC, and in doing so, most likely gained access to our customers payment card data, including the card holder's name, card number and security code," the business said in a statement.
